Class PersistenceConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.muni.fi.pa165.pokemon.context.PersistenceConfiguration

  • public class PersistenceConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class cofigures all the beans necessary to provide persistance context

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.sql.DataSource embeddedDataSource()
      Creates DataSource object for an embedded database (DERBY)
      LocalContainerEntityManagerFactoryBean entityManagerFactory()
      Creates entity manager factory so that it can be injected and used to create entity managers in DAO classes
      JpaTransactionManager transactionManager()
      Creates a transaction manager that is used by spring in classes/methods annotated as @Transactional which does not specify any transaction manager.
